content: Do we have a definition on noncommutative polynomials? I know about FreeAlgebra, but I don't know if we have a definition of noncommutative polynomials similar to the definition of normal polynomials
No, but what would it buy you over FreeAlgebra (besides parallelism between the API)?
I don't know, the parallelism with the Polynomial API would be the main thing. I should read in more detail FreeAlgebra
